SEARCH
Package edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model

Class Train

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model.Vehicle
edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model.Train
All Implemented Interfaces:
VehicleObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
DieselTrain, ElectricTrain
public abstract class Train extends Vehicle
Abstract representation of a train in the simulation. This class extends the Vehicle class and provides core functionality specific to trains, including movement, reporting, and CO2 emission calculations.
